item.title: Learn to build a Discord bot using Discord.py and host it on Replit (for free)
item.description: I made a Discord bot that can check and send the current and future stage information for my Splatoon 3 server. I used Python and the library Discord.py. For hosting the bot, I used Replit.com and did a little trick to make it online 24/7.
